summary: Applies a process to each pixel
description: Applies a unary process (a local operation) to each value in the data cube.

process.description: A process (callback) to be applied on each value. The specified process must be unary meaning that it must work on a single value.

x.description: A value of any data type could be passed.

returns.description: A data cube with the newly computed values. The resolution, cardinality and the number of dimensions are the same as for the original data cube.
